file_content.text: In the tower! Now!
Voss burns. Your friends suffer.
Such chaos demands my attention. Witness the destructive might of the Eternal Throne.
The throne is your bloodstained legacy.
This is your doing, Valkorion.
Under my rule, the throne was an instrument of peace. My daughter pursues more barbaric motives.
Go haunt someone else's head, old man.
Leave me alone.
Our bond is your best defense against my daughter's depravity.
If Vaylin remains on the throne, Voss is only a taste of the carnage to come.
Like father, like daughter. Though Vaylin's far from matching the stunt you pulled on Ziost.
She takes after you.
My child is more powerful than you can imagine.
Soon you will see.
Good shot, Theron.
I aim to please.
Next time, aim to kill.
Show-off.
You're a sight for sore eyes.
You arrived just in time.
The Voss are safe inside the Tower of Prophecy, but we can't hold out much longer.
Remind me to pin a medal on your chest when this is all over.
[Flirt] Nicely done.
Only if you watch the pin. I'm still sore from last time.
I hate to interrupt this touching moment, but we've got company.
Saving civilians isn't a priority. You were supposed to clear the city.
Forget the Voss.
I can manage both.
I hate to interrupt, but we've got company.
Deep down, you're proud of the monster you spawned.
You're enjoying this.
Vaylin is my most perfect creation--and the most dangerous.
Saving the planet will mean nothing if we don't protect the people living here.
Protect the Voss at all costs.
Remind me to give you a raise when this is finished.
Good work, Theron.
I'm glad you agree.
I'll hold you to it.
You didn't have a problem with Voss dying by your Wrath's hand.
I once killed Voss for you.
A necessary sacrifice is nothing compared to my daughter's depravity.
Were you cavorting across the galaxy--or have you been trapped in my head this whole time?
Where have you been?
I walked among the stars, saw the people of Zakuul suffer under my daughter's barbaric rule.
At last, the Immortal Emperor speaks.
Vaylin must be stopped. Show me her weakness, and we'll dethrone her together.
Help me defeat her.
When the time comes, I will stand by your side against Vaylin. Until then, beware her fury.
Such chaos demands my attention.
In my absence, you completed your training--and dethroned my son. But you also allowed my daughter to seize power.
Now witness the destructive might of the Eternal Throne.
We can hold them off from inside the tower. This way!
